segments.text: Hi , Michelle . Do you need to use the photocopier ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , hi Jeremy . No please , go ahead . So how are you , Jeremy ? I was talking to Linda about you only last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I'm fine , thanks . I'm super busy with work actually . Did you hear about the Lawson contract ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I was discussing the contract with Bill and he said that they met the head of Lawsons last week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And hopefully they are going to confirm the deal on Wednesday , fingers crossed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great news , Jeremy . Congratulations ! Anyway , I must get back , but give my regards to your wife Monica .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will , Michelle . Speak to you soon .
segments.speaker: S1
